speaker: DON PEDRO
text_entry: SCENE II. A room in LEONATO's house.

speaker: DON PEDRO
text_entry: Enter LEONATO and ANTONIO, meeting

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: How now, brother! Where is my cousin, your son?

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: hath he provided this music?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: He is very busy about it. But, brother, I can tell

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: you strange news that you yet dreamt not of.

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: Are they good?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: As the event stamps them: but they have a good

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: cover; they show well outward. The prince and Count

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Claudio, walking in a thick-pleached alley in mine

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: orchard, were thus much overheard by a man of mine:

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: the prince discovered to Claudio that he loved my

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: niece your daughter and meant to acknowledge it

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: this night in a dance: and if he found her

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: accordant, he meant to take the present time by the

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: top and instantly break with you of it.

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: Hath the fellow any wit that told you this?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: A good sharp fellow: I will send for him; and

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: question him yourself.

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: No, no; we will hold it as a dream till it appear

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: itself: but I will acquaint my daughter withal,

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: that she may be the better prepared for an answer,

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: if peradventure this be true. Go you and tell her of it.

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: Enter Attendants

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: Cousins, you know what you have to do. O, I cry you

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: mercy, friend; go you with me, and I will use your

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: skill. Good cousin, have a care this busy time.

speaker: LEONATO
text_entry: Exeunt
